text:
Five children, who consumed poisonous leaves in Kolli Hills and

fell unconscious, were admitted to District Government Headquarters hospital here on

Thursday. They were playing outside their houses in Thenur Nadu

on Wednesday when they consumed the leaves. Two boys and three girls vomited and they were taken to the Government Hospital in Semmedu and shifted to Namakkal GH.

Doctors said that they were out of danger.
title: Children hospitalised
